name: Solitaire Garden Escapes
description:
It’s time to get away and take a break from your real life. Come relax with the best tripeaks solitaire experience game there is. Play solitaire like you’ve never have before.

It’s your very own Solitaire Garden.

In the unique and beautiful solitaire experience, you will be able to build your own enchanted garden with precious and beautiful flowers. The more you play, the more flowers you will get to plant. Watch in amazement as your dreams become reality. Come escape reality in this gorgeous tripeaks adventure. Challenge your tripeaks solitaire skills by mastering each challenge. Will you be able to reach the star on each level?

YOUR TRIPEAKS SOLITAIRE ADVENTURE

* 100+ levels to challenge your mind
* Let’s go streaking! The more you play the more you earn
* Unlock wonderful and special boosters to enhance your gameplay
* Collect flowers to built

BUILD YOUR ZEN GARDEN

* Grow various exotic flowers as you progress through the game
* Design it any way you like - this is your building experience
* Upgrade to new and different gardens by beating new challenges
* Feel that zen moment as you build out your garden. This game has truly amazing graphics. You can finally feel at peace.

JOIN THE TOURNAMENT
* Write your name on the Leaderboard alongside other top gardeners by joining the Garden Tournament!
* Win enormous rewards at the end of the tournament!

If you love tripeaks solitaire, this is the game you must have. Your garden awaits you. Your story is ready to be told.
